name: Virus Attack Demo
description:
Controls:

  • Z - Attack
  • Arrows - Movement
  • Mouse - Actions in the UI

Virus Attack is a Tower Defense style game, which explores the theme of quarantine and viruses, as a way to raise awareness among the COVID-19 epidemic.

The concept of the game was born during the 11th APDJ game development Marathon, which has since become a consolidated product.

More information in: https://deyvidjlira.com/virus-attack-presskit/
